transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Haa bolo.
Hello?
Haa boliye na.
Executive: Sir hi very good afternoon, kaise hain aap?
Customer: Mai thik hu aap kaise hain?
Executive: Shree mai bhi bas badhiya tha thank you so much for asking. Shree Pawan Industries mein baat ho rahi thi kya?
Customer: Haa bol raha hu.
Executive: Yeah actually sir mai IndiaMART se senior manager baat kar rahi thi. Aapke aapke site se na hamari hamare jo executives hain jo aapka catalog handle karte hain unke pass na aapka aap logo ka call back aaya tha aapki company se related. To mai usse related hi aapse baat karna chah rahi thi koi doubt tha kya sir services vagera mein?
Customer: Doubt yani kya hai madam malum hai. Jo humko leads vagera aati hai wo aap mail pe dal dijiye.
Executive: Mail pe dal de?
Customer: Haa utna hi hai.
Executive: Sir acha mail pe to sir dekhiye actually mail pe to possible nahi hai. Jo leads aapko aati hai wo aapko aapke portal par hi show karti hain aur isse pehle mera primary number pe discussion hua tha 669 karke wo kaun hai sir?
Customer: Wo hamare ye hain MD sir jo hai na.
Executive: Acha wo wo hai thik hai unke sath mera discussion hua tha abhi buylead kaun consume karta hai aap consume karte hain ya fir aapke MD sir karte hain?
Customer: Mai karta hu.
Executive: Aap karte hain na thik hai to ye aapka same number whatsapp par available hai?
Customer: Same hai.
Executive: Thik hai pehle bhi maine discussion kiya tha aapke MD sir ke sath to waha par na humne ek common group create kiya hua hai sir jaha pe hum aapke product se related buylead na whatsapp par post karte hain. Thik hai matlab mail par obviously hum nahi de payenge kyunki wo IndiaMART ki policy nahi hai ki mail par de mail pe sirf aapko notification aa sakta hai ki koi buylead aapke portal par aayi hai ki nahi aayi hai aapke product se related koi buylead aayegi to uska sirf notification aapko mail par milega mail par aapko buylead ka link nahi milega sir thik hai to isliye humne bahut pehle ek group create kari thi jaha par hum aapke product se related na buylead bhejte hain daily basis pe do aapko us buylead ko consume karke hume feedback share karna hota hai to mai ek kaam karti hu us group mein na aapko add kar deti hu sir thik hai abhi Ruchi aapka account handle kar rahi hai filhal to aap Ruchi bhi us catalog mein add ho jayegi Ruchi aapko bhejenge daily basis pe buylead aap priority pe us buylead ko consume kijiyega aur consume karke na aap uska genuine feedback aap hume provide kijiyega ki wo aapke kaam ki buylead hai ya nahi hai.
Thik hai to agar hum aapko whatsapp par bhejte hain to wo to aapke liye better hai na sir wo to I think mujhe lagta hai mail se bhi acha option hai aapko whatsapp vagera aaye to.
Customer: Mere ko whatsapp pe mail pe dal dijiye na.
Executive: Sorry sorry.
Customer: Mail pe marketing karni hai.
Executive: Sir mail pe mai wahi bata rahi hu IndiaMART aapko whatsapp par bhi nahi deta hai sir. Personally aapka yahi problem resolve karane ke liye humne whatsapp par bola ki koi baat nahi aap portal se consume nahi kar pa rahe hain to hum whatsapp par bhej denge aapko.
Customer: Kya problem aapka hai? Mail pe dal dijiye na sabhi ko pata chalta hai.
Executive: Sir aapki voice clear nahi aa rahi hai mujhe abhi tak ache se aa rahi thi but abhi break ho rahi hai.
Customer: Mail id pe dal dijiye na sabhi logo ko pata chalta hai ki IndiaMART se kya leads aayi.
Executive: To sir mail par usse related aapko notification to jata hi hai na ki aapki category se related abhi ek buylead aayi hai aap open karke dekhiye notification aata hai aapke pass mail par.
Customer: Company aapko IndiaMART ko pay to karti hai na aapka amount jo hai wo barabar hai na?
Executive: Sir obviously aap pay karti hain lekin IndiaMART ne aap IndiaMART aap se ye bol ke paisa nahi leta hai ki hum aapko mail par buylead dete hain denge ye bol ke aapko IndiaMART ne paisa liya hai kya sir?
Customer: Nahi mai kya bol raha hu.
Executive: Nahi na uske liye proper aapko IndiaMART ne ek portal diya hua hai.
Customer: Mere ko requirement sorry mere ko requirement jo aap bhejane wale hai na wo mail pe bhej dijiye whatsapp pe bhejane.
Executive: Sir mail pe mail pe possible nahi hai sir hum company ke against kaise ja sakte hain mail pe kaise buylead hum aapko post kare?
Aap bataiye mail pe hum kaise aapko post kar de? Daily basis pe hum buylead daily sir aapko buylead hum whatsapp par bhi hume bhejane ke liye company ne nahi bola hai sir mai aapko clearly bata du.
Hanji hanji.
Sir aapki voice na clear nahi aa rahi hai mujhe.
Hello?
Executive: Aapko humne sab aapke sare option hai.
Customer: Haa aapki company ka mail id hai hamare pass matlab jo yaha pe register mail id aapki company pe wahi hai.
Executive: Hello?
Hello?
Hello?
Customer: Hanji hanji aap mail id pe dalne ko kya dikkat hai?
Executive: Sir hum whatsapp mai wahi aapko bata rahi hu sir hum whatsapp par bhi buylead aapko nahi dete. Sir hum mail par whatsapp par pehli buylead nahi dete hain IndiaMART aapko ek portal de diya hai aap us portal se buylead consume kar sakte hain hum us portal pe aapko buylead dete hain koi buylead aapke portal par aayi hai uska notification hum whatsapp par aapko dete hain.
Customer: Nahi madam sir ye abhi jo log hai na mail id pe dalte hain sir mai aapko wahi cheez aapko bata rahi hu jab bhi aapka suniye suniye aapne bola hai ki IndiaMART ko aap logo ne paisa diya hai right IndiaMART ko agar aap logo ne paisa nahi diya paisa diya to iska matlab ye nahi hai na sir ki aap jaise bolenge IndiaMART waise kaam karega IndiaMART ne bhi aapko kuch cheeze sir sunna padega aapko operate karna padega aapko operate karna sir suniye IndiaMART ne aapko pehle hi update sir meri baat to suniye IndiaMART ne bhi pehle aapko update karke hi paisa liya hai ki kaise aapko wo services dega.
Customer: Customer ki jo requirement hai wo aapko fulfill karni padegi.
Executive: Sir mai wahi cheez aapko bata rahi hu.
Customer: Aapke system mein aap changes kar do. Agar aap se nahi hota hai customer ki jo requirement hai wo aapko karke dena padega. Agar aap se nahi hota hai wo ye aapka problem hai customer ka nahi madam.
Executive: Mai wahi cheez aapko bata rahi hu ki IndiaMART ne bhi jab aap se paisa liya tha na sir aapko clearly bata ke liya tha sir aapne mujhe wahi line boli na ki humne aapko paisa diya hai to uske according karna padega sir nahi aap meri baat suniye mai aapki hi baat sun rahi hu aap meri baat bhi to suniye sir mai wahi bata rahi hu ki IndiaMART ne bhi na aapko jab paisa liya tha to aapko batate hue liya tha ki sir meri ye servicing hai aap interested hai to aap paisa le sakte hain hume aap waha par interested hoke hi aapne paisa diya hai na sir IndiaMART ko abhi man ab aap beech mein bolenge ki mere according kaam karo to kaise karega sir aap bataiye according nahi sir meri need hai mail id pe aap leads de do lekin aapko hota nahi hai.
To aap company ko bol dijiye na customer ki ye requirement hai wo mail id pe mang raha hai company ko dekh lijiye na kya karne ka kya nahi changes karne ka aap kyun load le rahe hain madam?
Executive: Sir kyunki company ko hum hi present karte hain company direct aake aapse baat nahi karti.
Customer: Wo company nahi nahi aap present karte ho lekin company decide karegi.
Executive: Bilkul aur sir mujhe pata sir hum already nahi ye customer ka problem hai Pawan Industries ke liye customer ka problem hai wo bol raha hai ki mail id pe aap sir aapke MD se mera discussion hua hai aapke MD ne to mujhe kabhi nahi bola ki mail par buylead bhejo sir.
Customer: Lekin mera number hai na sir ek baar aapke MD se baat sir mai aapke MD se baat kar lungi don't worry mai aapke MD se baat kar leti hu. Nahi aap baat kar lijiye sir haa mai unse baat karke fir mai aapse discuss karungi sir. Mera mera bhi number aapke pass hai na register?
Executive: Sorry?
Customer: Mera number aapke pass register hai na isliye aapne call kiya.
Executive: Mai wahi aapko bata rahi hu ki thik hai lekin aapke aap se sir suniye aap se upar hai na aapke MD sir unhone to kabhi nahi bola ki mujhe mail par buylead chahiye.
Customer: Sabhi sabhi mai dekhta hu sir ka pura. Mai wahi bol rahi hu aap mujhe thoda time dijiye nahi nahi aap mujhe thoda time dijiye mai aapke MD se baat karti hu thik hai agar wo bolenge ki mail par suniye agar wo bolenge ki haa mail par chahiye to mai baat karke de dungi. Ek kaam kijiye abhi aapne kya bola hamari MD se aap baat karne wali hai barabar? Haa mujhe baat karne dijiye pehle ek baar aapko jo senior hai unse mere ko baat karni hai aap unka number dijiye. Haa bilkul baat kar lijiye bilkul bilkul baat kar lijiye sir mai baat karwa deti hu koi dikkat nahi hai. Nahi aap mere ko number bhej dijiye mai unse baat karta hu. Sir mai unko bol rahi hu wo aapko call back karenge sir aap call answer kar lijiyega. Thik hai unka naam kya hai? Haa abhi 5 minute mein call aayega sir Saransh ke naam se aapke pass call aayega Saransh Agrawal. Saransh Agrawal. Thik hai aap call answer kar lijiyega mai ek baar aapke owner se baat karti hu. Mai bhi fir aapko baat karti hu. Ok ok ok.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer wants buyleads on mail instead of WhatsApp.



Resolution:

- Executive explained IndiaMART policy of portal buyleads.

- Executive offered to add customer to WhatsApp group.

- Executive will discuss with MD about mail preference.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will have Saransh call the customer.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Annoyed -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, mail, whatsapp, portal, md
